pages.text: This glistening hoop creates a protective film of air around you.$(br2)Grants you $(c_green)4$() points of $(c_blue)Azure Dike$(). Using those charges, it not only protects you from enemy projectiles, but can even cushion a long fall.$(br)The Puff Circlet also prevents $(item)Farmland$() from being trampled.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)Gone are the days of being sniped from behind by Skeletons.
